Package com.jacobrymsza.librarymanagementsystem.controller.web

Class WebBorrowingController

java.lang.Object
com.jacobrymsza.librarymanagementsystem.controller.web.WebBorrowingController
@Controller @RequestMapping("/borrowings") public class WebBorrowingController extends Object
MVC Controller for managing borrowing-related operations in the library system. Provides endpoints for viewing, creating, and returning borrowings via Thymeleaf templates.

  • Constructor Details

    • WebBorrowingController

      @Autowired public WebBorrowingController(BorrowingService borrowingService, BookService bookService, UserService userService)
      Constructs a new WebBorrowingController with the specified services. This constructor uses Spring's dependency injection to provide access to the services required for managing borrowings, books, and users in the library system.
      Parameters:
      borrowingService - the service for managing borrowing operations, must not be null
      bookService - the service for managing book operations, must not be null
      userService - the service for managing user operations, must not be null

  • Method Details

    • getAllBorrowings

      @GetMapping public String getAllBorrowings(org.springframework.ui.Model model)
      Displays a list of all borrowing records in the system.
      Parameters:
      model - the Spring MVC model to hold attributes for the view
      Returns:
      the name of the Thymeleaf template for displaying the list of borrowings

    • showBorrowForm

      @GetMapping("/new") public String showBorrowForm(org.springframework.ui.Model model)
      Shows the form for borrowing a book.
      Parameters:
      model - the Spring MVC model to hold attributes for the view
      Returns:
      the name of the Thymeleaf template for the borrowing form

    • borrowBook

      @PostMapping("/new") public String borrowBook(@ModelAttribute("borrowRequest") BorrowRequestDTO borrowRequestDTO, org.springframework.ui.Model model)
      Handles the submission of the borrowing form.
      Parameters:
      borrowRequestDTO - the DTO containing borrowing request details
      model - the Spring MVC model to hold attributes for the view
      Returns:
      a redirect to the borrowings list on success, or the form on error

    • returnBook

      @PostMapping("/{id}/return") public String returnBook(@PathVariable Long id, org.springframework.ui.Model model)
      Handles the return of a borrowed book.
      Parameters:
      id - the ID of the borrowing to return
      model - the Spring MVC model to hold attributes for the view
      Returns:
      a redirect to the borrowings list on success, or the list with an error message
